name: Astro (itch)
description:
A short narrative game with gravity pull mechanics and fun slow motion.

We have developed this game to test our bachelor thesis, and we would greatly appreciate it, if you would be so kind as to answer the questionnaire at the end of the game.

Enjoy and make sure to tell us what you think in the comments!

CONTROLS

The game has been balanced for Xbox and Playstation 4 controllers, but you can also play it using keyboard.

Credits:

Carlsen, Joakim - Narrative, Programming

Ipsen, Anders - Programming

Janiszewski, Jan Kanty - Creative Direction, Shaders, Programming, Branding

Thynov, Mikkel - Programming

Made for the "Theory and Practice of Game Development" course facilitated by Henrik Schønau Fog at Medialogy BSc., Aalborg University in Copenhagen.
